content.rendered:
Here’s what makes this offer unique:

  • Discounted Artwork: Express yourself with a permanent masterpiece at a reduced price.
  • Weekday Convenience: Fit your tattoo appointment into your busy schedule.
  • Expert Artists: Our talented team will bring your vision to life.

Ready to claim your discount? Browse our artist portfolios online or schedule a free consultation to discuss your design ideas. Don’t miss out on this chance to transform your body with a meaningful and beautiful tattoo.

P.S. Remember, a tattoo is a permanent decision. We encourage you to bring reference images and discuss your design thoroughly with your chosen artist.

T&C

  1. Prior appointment is required
  2. One voucher is valid for one person, one tattoo & on a single visit
  3. Not valid for cashback
  4. This gift voucher cannot be clubbed/redeemed with any other promotional offer at Black Poison Tattoos
  5. Black Poison Tattoos reserves all rights to amend rules
  6. Not valid on Festivals Days, Public Holidays & Weekends
  7. Rates differ as per the customization and the artists
  8. Rates depend on Tattoo Design, Artist, Size, Timing, and body Placement.
  9. No verbal commitments are accepted in case of dispute, outlet management’s decision will be final.
  10. For further inquiry on offers visit our outlet or call us.
  11. 1500 INR Setup cost is applicable on tattoos in this offer
  12. There is no additional cost for a 1 square inch tattoo other than the Setup cost
  13. A standard rate of 700 INR per square inch is applicable above 1 sq. in. Tattoo

excerpt.rendered: Get 25% off on your next tattoo at Black Poison Tattoos during our weekday special! This offer is valid from 12 PM to 4 PM Monday through Friday.
